input.sentences: this land is a beautiful land . i moved here when i was a young man .
i will tell you how i became a successful cabbage farmer and grew the biggest head of cabbage in location .
the land did n't always look like this . i built my farmhouse on it with my own hands and tamed the wilderness .
then i planted some crops . i could not have done it without the help of my neighbors .

the crops grew huge and we had an amazing bounty within the first year ! and would n't you know it | there was the biggest head of cabbage i had seen . i took it to the county fair and it won first prize .
output.sentences: The seas were calm that day.
There had been a good harvest that year.
Everyone at the farm was happy.
It was full of life and vigor.
